title: Hextech Crafting/Loot tab broken with new client.
body: So i bought some chests last week, and after i opened them all the Loot tab has nothing in it. I don't know if there is anything that can fix this or if this is a problem with anyone else. I tried reinstalling the game, the repair tool, nothing works. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Do you happen to have your Windows display language set to something other than English? If so, I recommend changing it to English to see if this is resolved by that change. We've been seeing this happen to some players.

I've seen a few reports on this, and it looks to be isolated to the updated client.  Report this over to the client devs at the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  In the meantime, see if your crafting materials are showing up in the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
